Witless cowards with no stomach for blood.
Du hast recht {s65}, aber was können wir tun?
Ich bin nicht einverstanden, Sir. Es ist besser, dass es Frieden gibt.

Ah, 'tis good to hear someone who understands! As a matter of fact, there is something we can do, {playername}. A little bit of provocation... If one of our war parties managed to enter their territory and pillage one of their caravans, or raided one of their villages, and perhaps left behind a little token or two of the {s14}, they would have ample cause to declare war on us. And then, well, even the cowards among us must rise to defend themselves. So what do you say? Are you interested?
Einen ausgezeichneten Plan. Zählen Sie auf mich.
Warum machen Sie das nicht selber?

Well, {playername}, some of the lords in our kingdom won't like the idea of someone inciting a war without their consent. They are already looking for an excuse to get at me. If I were to do this, they would make me pay for it dearly. You, on the other hand, are young, well liked and daring, so you might just get away with it. And of course, I will back you up and defend your actions against any potential opponents. All in all, a few lords might be upset by your actions, but I am sure that you won't be bothered with that.
Das scheint angemessen. Ich bin bereit, dies zu tun.
I don't like this. Find yourself someone else to take the blame for your schemes.
Sehr gut! Ein Überfall auf eine Karawane oder, wenn Sie das nicht schaffen, ein Angriff auf eines ihrer Dörfer, sollte es tun. Nun, viel Glück und gute Jagd. Gehen Sie, die Grenzen in Flammen setzen!
Ach, glauben Sie wirklich? Aber wie lange wird Ihr kostbarer Frieden anhalten? Nicht lange, glauben Sie mir.
Hm. Wie du willst, {Playername}. Ich dachte, Sie hätten Feuer in sich, aber es scheint, dass ich falsch lag.

Well, some of the serfs working my fields in {s4} have run away. The ungrateful swine, I let them plough my fields and rent my cottages, and this is how they repay me! From what I've been hearing, they're running to {s3} as fast as they can, and have split up into three groups to try and avoid capture. I want you to capture all three groups and fetch them back to {s4} by whatever means necessary. I should really have them hanged for attempting to escape, but we need hands for the upcoming harvest, so I'll let them go off this time with a good beating.

I have good information that a man in this very town is actually an enemy spy. He should be seized and hanged for his impudence, but we also believe that very soon he will leave town to meet with his master, the man to whom the spy feeds all his little whispers. The spy himself is of little import, but the master is a dangerous man, and could tell us a great deal if we could only get our hands on him...

I want you to wait here until the spy leaves town. Then you must follow him, stealthily, to the meeting place. You must take absolute care not to be seen by the spy on your way; else he may suspect foul play and turn back. When the master appears, you must ambush and arrest them and bring the pair back to me. Alive, if you please.
Ich werde es tun, {s65}.
No, this skulking is not for me.
Good, I'm sure you'll do a fine job of it. One of my men will point the spy out to you when he leaves, so you will know the man to follow. Remember, I want them both, and I want them alive.
A shame. Well, carry on as you were, {playername}...

There is a difficult job I need done, {playername}, and you may be the {reg59?one:man} who can carry it off. I need someone to capture one of the noble lords of the {s13} and bring him to me. Afterwards, I'll be able to exchange him in return for a relative of mine held by the {s13}. It is a simple enough job, but whomever you choose will be guarded by an elite band of personal retainers. Are you up for a fight?
Betrachtet es als erledigt, {s65}.
I must refuse, {s65}. I am not a kidnapper.
I like your spirit! Go and bring me one of our enemies, and I'll toast your name in my hall when you return! And reward you for your efforts, of course...
Clearly, you lack the mettle I had thought you possessed. Very well, {playername}, I will find someone else.
I don't have a job for you right now, but your companion {s3} is a skilled {reg3?lass:fellow}, and I need someone with {reg3?her:his} talents. Will you lend {reg3?her:him} to me for a while?
Wie lang werdet ihr {reg3?her:him} brauchen?
Nur noch ein paar Tage, oder höchsten eine Woche.
Then I will leave {s3} with you for one week.
I am sorry, but I cannot do without {s3} for a whole week.
I cannot thank you enough, {playername}. Worry not, your companion shall be returned to you with due haste.
Well, that's damned unfortunate, but I suppose I cannot force you or {s3} to agree. I shall have to make do without.

Some time ago, I loaned out a considerable sum of money to {s3}. {reg4} peningas, to be precise. He was supposed to pay it back within a month but I haven't received a copper from him since. That was months ago. If you could collect the debt from him on my behalf, I would be grateful indeed. I would even let you keep one fifth of the money for your trouble. What do you say?
Weißt du wo ich {s3}, {s65} finden kann?
If you leave now, you should be able to find him at {s4}. I've no doubt that he will be suitably embarrassed by his conduct and give you all the money he owes me.
Then I will talk to {s3} on your behalf.
Vergebt mir {s65}! Ich dachte, ich wäre erfolgreicher als ihr!
You made me very happy by accepting this {playername}. Please, talk to {s3} and don't leave him without my money.
Perhaps not, {playername}. I suppose I'm never getting that money back...

I tell you, that blubbering fool {s13} is not fit to rule {s14}. God knows he would be divested of his lands in an instant were it not for one of his loyal vassals, {s15}. As long as he has his vassal aiding him, it will be a difficult job beating him. So I need to get {s15} out of the picture, and I have a plan just to do that... With your help, naturally.
{s66}, I am all ears.
I don't wish to involve myself in anything dishonourable against {s15}.
Dishonourable? Bah! I was hoping I could count on you, {playername}, but you've shown me what a fool I was. I shall have to find someone whose loyalty I can trust.

I have written a fake letter to {s15}, bearing my own seal, which implicates him in a conspiracy with us to stage a coup in {s14}, in my favour. If we can make {s13} believe the letter is genuine, he will deal with {s15} very swiftly. Of course, the challenge there is to convince {s13} that the letter is indeed real...
Bitte fahrt fort, {s65}...
Nein,ich werde mich nicht mit diesem unehrenhaften Schema beflecken.

This is where you come into play. You'll take the letter to {s14}, then give it to one of your soldiers and instruct him to take it to {s15}. I will have one of my spies inform the town garrison so that your man will be arrested on his way. The guards will then find the letter and take it to {s13}. They'll torture your man, of course, to try and get the truth out of him, but all he knows is that you ordered the letter to be delivered to {s15} under the utmost secrecy. {s13} knows you serve me, and the fool will certainly believe the whole charade.
Ist das alles?

There is one more thing... Your messenger must be someone trustworthy. If you sent the letter with a simple peasant, someone expendable, {s13} might suspect a plot. He may have the wits of a snail, but even a snail can see the obvious. Give the letter to someone of rank. One of your {s9}, perhaps.
What? I can't send one of my trusted {s9} to his death!
Then a {s8} it will be.
Come now, {playername}. There is a place for sentimentality, but this is not it. Believe me, you shall be generously compensated, and what is the purpose of soldiers if not to die at our say-so?
A {s8} it is.
No, I'll not sacrifice one of my chosen men.

I can't tell you how pleased I am to hear that, {playername}. You are removing one of the greatest obstacles in my path. Here is the letter, as well as 500 peningas for your expenses. Remember, there'll be more once you succeed. Much, much more...

A group of my soldiers was captured in a recent skirmish with the enemy. Thankfully, we have a mutual agreement of prisoner exchange, and they will release my men, but they want us to give them prisoners of equal rank and number. Prisoners I don't currently have. So, I need a good {reg59?warrior:man} to find me {reg1} {s3} as prisoners, that I may exchange them.
Nein, {playername}, ich brauche derzeit deine Hilfe nicht.
Ihr könnt auf mich zählen, {s65}.
Ich fürchte, ich kann nicht eine solche Mission im Moment akzeptieren.
Excellent, {playername}, excellent. I have every confidence in you.
Is that so? Well, I suppose you're just not up to the task. I shall have to look for somebody with more mettle.
Ich muss nun gehen.
Es steht euch frei zu gehen.
I have some propositions for you.
What propositions, you bloody lowlife?
Never mind. You have nothing that I want.
I feel a lot of admiration for your spouse, {s33}. I see a divorce in your future...
Let me court your {s11}, {s33}, or else...
I will set you free if you allow me to court your {s11}, {s33}.
Ich glaube ich kann damit leben.
I think you are plain crazy to offer me something like that!
Would you mind if I collect some of the taxes from one of your fiefs for a while?
Well, that would depend. Which one do you have in mind?
Macht nichts.
I suppose, if you set me free, I can allow you to collect half the rents from {s33} for about four weeks.
I think you're out of your mind. I prefer the comforts here, small though they be, to paying such a price.
No, I had something else in mind.
Great! You're free to go.
Ok, you win. I will get the divorce, but, remember, I will hunt you down like a dog!
I think you're out of your mind. I love my spouse more than life itself.
Actually, I don't need you to do that.
Großartig. Es steht Ihnen frei, zu gehen.
Ok, you win. I give you permission to visit my {s11}, {s33}.
I think you're out of your mind. I love her more than life itself.
Actually, I don't want to do that.
Großartig. Es steht Ihnen frei, zu gehen.
This audience is over. I leave now.
I must beg my leave.

Before you go, {playername}, I have something to ask of you... We may be enemies in this war, but I pray that you believe, as I do, that we can still be civil towards each other. Thus, I hoped that you would be kind enough to assist me in something important to me.
Ich höre.

I have a friend here, an old warrior, who is very sick. Pestilence has infected an old battle wound. Unless a surgeon sees him soon, he will surely die. This man is dear to me, {playername}, but he's also stubborn as a hog and refuses to have anyone look at his injury because he doesn't trust the physicians here. I have heard that you've a capable surgeon with you. If you would let your surgeon come here and have a look, {reg3?she:he} may be able to convince him to give his consent to an operation. Please, I will be deeply indebted to you if you grant me this request.
Wir sehen uns wieder.
Farewell, my lady. I shall remain your most ardent admirer.
Selbstverständlich, {playername}. Lebt wohl.
Good journeys to you, {playername}.
Ja, ja, lebt wohl.
Wir werden uns wieder sehen.
Are you enjoying the journey, {s65}?
I am doing quite fine, {playername}. Thank you for your concern.
Ja,
As you are my chief minister, I wish to speak to about affairs of state.
I have acquired everything for {s4}'s gift.
Let's abandon our plan to {s10}.
Are you sure you want to drop that idea?
Yes, I am sure. Let's abandon that idea.
Actually, never mind.
Let us think of a way to improve our standing in this realm.
I was thinking that perhaps we could host a feast.
Let us take inventory of our household possessions.
Anyway, that is the content of our larder.
Wie sind meine Nachkommen?
Your offspring grow healthy and strong. We have {reg3?{reg5} boys:one boy}.
Your offspring grow healthy and strong. We have {reg5?{reg3} girls:one girl}.
Your offspring grow healthy and strong. We have {reg4?{reg5} boys:one boy} and {reg2?{reg3} girls:one girl}.
Ihre Nachkommen? Wir haben keine Nachkommen.
Very well. Take care of them and make sure they lack for nothing.
I have had a child!
Ich bin so glücklich!
Sehr gut.
How does the mother of my child fare?
I want to show love to my spouse.
Na sicher! Was hattest du im Sinn?
A romantic meal and what follows after.
I want to give this beautiful ring, this gold bracelet and this necklace to my wife (2.000 peningas)
Eigentlich habe ich meine Meinung geändert
Oh, {playername}! You're so generous.
I look forward to that, {playername}. I will let the servants buy horse meat and wine. I love being a mother.
I would like that. I will let the servants buy a chicken and mead, but it is not time to have a child. First, we need to know each other better.
Is that some sort of a joke? I'm too young.^^[You need to improve relation with your wife.]
I am so tired today.^^[You need to improve relation with your wife.]
Ha! some other day.^^[You need to improve relation with your wife.]
[You eat dinner in the company of your wife. You both get to know one another a little better.^Finally, your wife takes your hand and leads you to the bedroom.]
[Time flies away from war, fear and the rigors of travel... In nine months, you will have a child.]
[You eat dinner in the company of your wife. You both get to know one another a little better. When the evening ends, your wife says goodbye to you before you can propose anything.]
We shall speak later, my {reg59?husband:wife}.
My husband, I hereby pledge to be your wife, to stand with you in good times and bad. May the heavens smile upon us and bless us with children, livestock, and land.
I pledge the same. Let us be husband and wife.
Wait -- hold on... I'm not quite ready for this.
I now declare you and {s3} to be husband and wife. Go now to the chamber prepared for you, and we shall make arrangements for your bride to join you in your hall in {s11}.
Is there anything else, my {reg59?wife:husband}?
A splendid idea, my {reg59?wife:husband}. However, let us wait for the current feast here to conclude, before organizing another.
A splendid idea, my {reg59?wife:husband}. However, we must establish a court before hosting a feast.
A splendid idea, my {reg59?wife:husband}. However, our realm has recently had a feast. Perhaps we should wait another {reg3} days before we organize another one.

A splendid idea, my {reg59?wife:husband}. However, not to insult our guests, we must make sure that we can provide a large and varied repast, for the lords, their families, and their retinues. All told, we should count on a couple of hundred mouths to feed, over several days. Let us take an inventory of our household possessions...
Lassen Sie mich mehr Items zu Ihrem Lagerhäuser hinzufügen
All right, let me re-evaluate what is there...
Let us dispatch the invitations
Lasst uns dann warten

I shall send word, then, that we will host a feast as soon as conditions in the realm permit. You perhaps should continue to stock our larder, so that we may do justice to our reputation for hospitality.

Very well, then. Let the feast begin immediately at our court {reg4?here:} in {s9}. You perhaps should continue to stock our larder, so that we may do justice to our reputation for hospitality. You may declare the feast to be concluded at any time, either by beginning a campaign or by letting it be known that the vassals can return to their homes.

Very well, then. Let the feast begin immediately in {s9}. You perhaps should continue to stock our larder, so that we may do justice to our reputation for hospitality. You may declare the feast to be concluded at any time, either by beginning a campaign or by letting it be known that the vassals can return to their homes.
Leider gibt es keine geeignete Veranstaltungsorte, um das Fest zu auszutragen.
How wonderful it is... In a short while, we shall be married! However, I should point out that, in the remaining few days, it is not customary for us to speak too much together.
Em, {playername}, you might not be used to our wedding customs, but I had hoped that someone would tell you... Speak first to my {s11}, {s4}.
I do not know where to find my {s11} {s10}, who by tradition should preside over our wedding. Perhaps we should wait until he can be found...
The honorable {s12} has agreed to allow us to return home to our families. We shall be departing shortly.
So groß ist meine Einsamkeit! Wie ich meine Familie vermisse!
You are a cad, {reg59?madame:sir}, to hold a lady like this...
It is strange. On occasion, you have shown me such kindness, and yet you continue to hold me here against my will.
Why haven't my family paid my ransom? You may hold me as prisoner, but it seems that you care for me more than they do!
Greetings, {reg59?my lady:sir}. The tides of war have left me stranded here in this fortress, but I will shortly be departing.
{playername} -- I assume that you, as a {reg59?lady:man} of honor, will accord gentle-born ladies such as us the right to return to our families, and not demand a ransom.
Thank you for escorting me here, my {reg59?daughter:son}. Please accept this small gift as a token of my gratitude.
Thank you for escorting me here, {playername}. Please accept this gift as a token of my gratitude. I hope we shall meet again sometime in the future.
It was an honor to serve you, {s65}.
It was an honor to serve you, Father.
We will shortly depart{s5}. It is good to know that some people in this world retain a sense of honor.
Natürlich, meine Dame
You assume wrong, my lady!
What? What infamy is this?
My apologies - you must have misunderstood me. Of course, you may leave.
Contact your family to arrange for a ransom, my lady.
Then write to your family, and ask them to hurry up with the ransom!
Ich habe meine Meinung geändert. Es steht euch frei zu gehen
I'm happy to tell you, {playername}, that my 'ghost' ex-lover doesn't bother me anymore. You really did it, {playername}! You're my new hero!
Oh, {playername}, what a shame! You were beaten by a ghost and yet have the nerve to show up here? My life is ruined because of you! Leave!
Well, {playername}, you fought a duel with {s10} and lost. According to our custom and tradition, I should no longer receive you. Farewell, {playername}.

Oh, {playername}, I have heard of your duel with {s10}. I wish now that you had never fought him, for our honor and tradition demand that, having lost to him, you must now break off your suit with me. Farewell, {playername}.
Very well, we must do as tradition demands... Farewell, my lady.
Let honor and tradition hang!
Oh, {playername}! Although people will talk, it would so break my heart to be able to see you no longer. We shall ignore this silly, cruel tradition.
No, {playername}, I cannot afford to fritter away my good name, and neither can you.
Oh, {playername}, I have heard that you won your duel with {s10}. I am grateful that you have delivered me from that man's attentions!
Well, {playername}, you won your duel with {s10}. Clearly, he was not worthy of my affections.
Well, {playername}, you won your duel with {s10}. Oh, such foolishness, that men should fight over me! Sigh... But it is a bit romantic, I suppose.
Well, {playername}, you won your duel with {s10}. Honor now demands that he and I no longer meet... I was fond of him, you know. You did me no service by fighting him, sir.

My dear {playername}, how joyous to see you again! I heard you gave that vile {s13} a well-deserved lesson. I hope he never forgets his humiliation. I've a reward for you, but I fear it's little compared to what you've done for me.
Oh, it will just have to do.
{s66}, das ist zuweit entfernt!
Please, {s65}, no reward is necessary.
I was told that you sought satisfaction from {s13} to prove my innocence, {playername}. It was a fine gesture, and I thank you for your efforts.
I beg your forgiveness for my defeat, {s65}...

It matters not, dear {playername}. You tried. The truth cannot be proven at the point of a sword, but you willingly put your life at stake for my honour. That alone will convince many of my innocence.
Ah {playername} - you must have received my message. How happy I am that you could come!
{playername} - is there any word from my family?
I hear that my {s11} has refused your request to marry me. Does that mean that we must part?
Oh, {playername}, you brought him back to me! Thank you ever so much for rescuing my {s11}. Please, take this as some small repayment for your noble deed.
Oh, {playername}, you brought him back to me! Thank you ever so much for rescuing my {s11}. Please, take this as some small repayment for your noble deed.
Es ist immer eine Ehre zu dienen, {s65}.
You must be {playername}. We have just had the honor of watching you distinguish yourself in the recent tournament{s8}.
You must be {playername}. My {s15} {s16} has spoken most highly of you. I am delighted to make your acquaintance.
I say, you don't look familiar...
Ah, {playername}. How good it is to see you again. However, I believe that I am required elsewhere.
{playername} -- how good it is to see you. (Whispers:) I still remember your visits fondly.
Ah, {playername}. How splendid it was to see you distinguish yourself in the recent tournament.
I have sad news. I have become betrothed to {s5} -- against my will, I should say! Oh, {playername}, I would so much rather be wed to you!
Good {playername} -- I have become betrothed to {s5}. It is now no longer seemly for us to see each other like this.
I must tell you -- there is another lord who has been paying me attentions, although I cannot abide him. I fear he has designs on me, and may try to force me to wed against my will.
{s11}It is probably not suitable for us to tarry too long here in conversation, but I would hope to see you again soon.
I was planning to retire for a little while, but perhaps we may have a chance to speak later...
It is so delightful to have a chance to spend some time together.{s12}
What brings you here today?
No word so far...
On second thought, now is not the time for us to marry
Never! We must elope together at once!
Perhaps I may still be able to change your {s11}'s mind
So be it -- let us then part
Good {playername} -- you are a good and kind man, but a lady cannot defy her family. Such things are not done!
Sir -- as you may know, I have been entertaining offers from a number of gentlemen such as yourself. I am not yet at a stage where I can commit to any of them.
Ah {playername}, you must realize. You are still finding your way in the world. I have great affection for you, {playername}, but I will not consign myself to obscurity.

Ah {playername}, although you are kind to me, I am not certain enough of your moral fiber to risk such a thing. Although I bare little affection for my husband, it would be a weighty thing to go against my family's wishes, and I am not certain enough of you to take that step.
Good {playername} -- to elope would be to throw away my ties with my family, which are everything to me! I have a considerable affection for you, but I am not sure that I am prepared to risk that.

Good {playername} -- I am not used to the hardships of campaigning as you are. I want a home to call my own. If you were lord of a castle or town with a great hall, I would gladly go there as your wife, to be mistress of the household. But I do not wish to live like a hunted animal.

Elope with you? Yes -- we could do that. It is a great step to defy my family -- but a loveless marriage, and life without you, might be a far worse thing! But be warned -- this will be a terrible blow to my {s11}'s prestige, and he will do everything in his power to bring you down.
Schnell! Es gibt keine Zeit zu verlieren!
Everything in his power, you say? Em... Let me think about this...
Your lordship... Your ladyship... Would you like me to witness your exchange of vows?
Yes, do that. For my part, I make the following vow: I, {s4}, do swear that I accept {playername} as my husband, according to the ancient law and custom of our land...
Very good. Do you, {playername}, swear similarly to accept {s4} as your wife?
I do.
Eh, what? This is all moving too fast...
Oh, really? My dear -- I could never separate a lady from her family like that...
So I suppose our time together must come to an end...
Yes -- it must be...
Wait -- perhaps there is still a chance for us!
Farewell, {playername}. We will see each other, in the courts and castles of this realm, but we must keep our distance from each other. I will remember these days fondly, nonetheless.
In that case, we shall see what the future brings.
Es ist immer eine Ehre zu dienen, {s65}.
Ich bin {playername}.
Mein Name ist {Playername}. Zu Ihren Diensten.
Of course. How splendid to finally make your acquaintance.
{playername}? I do not believe I've heard of you before.
I am about to retire for a little while, but perhaps we may have a chance to speak later...
Now, if you will excuse me...
Can I help you with anything?
I want to know the location of someone.
Now, if you will excuse me...
Gibt es noch etwas?
May I have the honor of knowing more about you, my lady?
My lady, I would like to profess myself your most ardent admirer
My lady, I would like to dedicate my successes in this recent tournament to you
{s11}I would like it very much if we could see more of each other.
Ah... You are too kind... My, the hour is getting rather late, isn't it? I really must be going.
Do you like poetry, my lady?
That would depend on the poem. Did you intend to recite a verse?
The muse Calliope bore to Morpheus a son named Orpheus...
A lion was awakened from sleep by a mouse running over his face...
Dort liegt eine abgelegene Insel....
LO, praise of the prowess of people-kings...
But anxious cares already seized the queen...
Actually, I can't think of any that I would care to recite...
Die Zeit vergeht zu schnell und wir können hier nicht ewig verweilen.
Meine Dame, denkt Ihr, dass wir vielleicht eine gemeinsame Zukunft haben werden?
Sir -- as you may know, I have been entertaining offers from a number of gentlemen such as yourself. I am not yet at a stage where I can commit to any of them.
It is good to hear that you are thinking seriously about the future. However, I would like to see you rise a little further in the world before I am ready to commit to marry you.
It is good to hear that your intentions are honorable. However, I have resolved only to marry a man of the strongest moral fiber. I would like you to prove yourself more in that regard.

Sir -- it is comforting to hear that your intentions towards me are honorable. But perhaps we should take the time to get to allow our affections for each other to grow a little stronger, before making any such decision.
Oh {playername}, how happy that would make me! But my {s11} {s4} would never allow it... Perhaps it is best that we part...
Oh {playername}, how happy that would make me! Go ask my {s11} {s4} for permission!
It is good to hear that your intentions are honorable. However, I am not ready to commit yet.
Perhaps I can persuade you to delay no further.
Was habt Ihr zu sagen?
Love is as a rose, my lady. Left unplucked, it may wither.
Oh, vergesst es.

Enough, sir! I shall not be rushed into marriage, with you or with anyone else! You have made me very cross. Please, leave me alone for a while. I shall let you know when I am ready to speak to you again.
Oh {playername}, I could never allow that to happen! Oh, if only we could be wed! But my {s11} {s4} would never give his permission... Perhaps it is best that we part...
Oh {playername}, I could never allow that to happen! Go ask my {s11} {s4} his permission for us to be wed!
Very well -- I shall continue to strive to be worthy of your esteem!
I am tired of these games! I will speak to your family about arranging a wedding immediately.
What? Do you mean that?
No, of course not. Please forgive my outburst of temper.
Yes. You clearly do not know what is in your best interests.
It grieves me to hear that, my lady, but such things must be
Who is the miscreant! Tell me his name!
I am tired of these games! I will demand that your family compel you to marry me.

I would be so grateful! But from what I understand, you already have a duel on your hands. He is not honor-bound to fight you, if you are committed to another combat. Please, conclude your other business in a hurry, to rescue me from that man's attentions.
Ah! Such talk. But from what I hear, you already have a duel on your hands. Finish one before you start another! Sigh... You men can be so silly...
It is {s5}. Please, rescue me from that man's attentions!
Will you now? This should be interesting. Very well. Your rival is {s5}. Let us see which of you has the greater mettle.

Oh, fie! I wish that this were not a matter of honor, so I could refuse such a request. But alas, I feel compelled to tell you that your rival is {s5}. I wish that heaven had not granted me such a fair visage, so that I would not inspire such passions in men!
I will have none of such talk! It is nonsense for you and {s5} to fight over -- whoops! I beg of you, sir, forget the name that just escaped my lips...
So be it! I shall challenge him to a trial of arms!
On second thought, I let my passions run away with me there. Never mind.
Good. You are wise not to let your temper guide you.
Wegen eures Auftrags an mich...
Yes {reg59?madam:sir}, have you made any progress on it?
Indeed. I brought you {reg5} {reg1?pieces:piece} of {s33}.
Indeed. I brought you {reg5} {reg1?bottles:bottle} of {s33} and 2 pieces of cheese.
Thank you very much, {playername}! I really appreciate your helping me. I promise I would find a way to reward you for your valiant efforts.
Thank you very much, {playername}! I really appreciate your helping me. I promise I would find a way to reward you for your valiant efforts.
Ich arbeite immernoch daran.
I am afraid I won't be able to finish it.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}, but please hurry up.
Ah, I am sorry to hear that {reg59?madam:sir}. I'm very disappointed in you!
Is there anything I can do to win your favour?
I don't have anything else for you to do right now.
Oh, {playername}, there is a delicate matter. I need you to take a message to my... to {s3}. Do you think you could do me this little favor? {s33}

Oh, I fear I may never see my {s17}, {s13}, again... He is a prisoner in the dungeon of {s14}. We have tried to negotiate his ransom, but it has been set too high. We can never hope to raise that much money without selling everything we own, and God knows {s13} would rather spend his life in prison than make us destitute. Instead, I came up with a plan to get him out of there, but it requires someone to make a great sacrifice, and so far, my pleas have fallen on deaf ears...

My poor {s11}, {s13}, is a prisoner in the {s14} dungeons. The only way we can talk to each other is by exchanging letters whenever we can, but the journey is so dangerous that we get little chance to do so. Please, would you deliver one for me?
Dear {playername}, you are kind to ask, but you know little of my troubles and I can't possibly ask you to throw yourself into danger on my behalf.
Tell me what the problem is, and I can make my own decision.

Very well, as you wish it... My husband has made certain enemies in his life, {playername}. One of the most insidious is {s13}. He is going around making terrible accusations against me, impugning my honour at every turn! Because he cannot harm my husband directly, he is using me as a target to try and stain our name. You should hear the awful things he's said! I only wish there was someone brave enough to make him recant his slander, but {s13} is a very fine swordsman, and he's widely feared...
I fear him not, {s65}. I will make him take back his lies.

Oh! I can't ask that of you, {playername}, but... I would be forever indebted to you, and you are so sure. It would mean so much if you would defend my honour. Thank you a thousand times, all my prayers and my favour go with you.
If he is that dangerous, perhaps maybe it would be better to ignore him...
Oh... Perhaps you're right, {playername}. I should let go of these silly childhood ideas of chivalry and courage. {reg59?People:Men} are not like that, not anymore. Good day to you.
Well, {playername}, there is a delicate matter that I am not sure how to solve. I have been having nightmares lately...
You can count on me, my lady. Your secret is safe with me.
Nightmares? Hmm. Well, good luck with that.

Well, {playername}, when I was younger, many years ago, there was a very handsome young guard in our castle. I had never seen anyone so handsome. Long story short, we fell in love, and..., well, we became lovers. But then I was married off to my husband, and my love was sent away. I have never seen him again. I have always suspected that either my father or my husband or both of them learned about our affair and sent him to die somewhere, or just hired an assassin to kill him. It was many years ago, but suddenly I started having these dreams in which he is calling me, asking me to go with him and saying that my husband is the one who murdered him. But many years have passed, and I don't feel the infatuation anymore. He's dead, and I'm not, so how can I join him, anyway? Is he a ghost now, asking me to die to join him?
No need to worry, my lady. I will deal with this 'ghost.' Where exactly is he calling you?
Entschuldigung, Ich kann dir dabei nicht helfen.

He seems to be somewhere around {s33}. Oh, {playername}, I am so grateful. But, please, I beg you, be very discrete about this matter. I don't want my husband or anyone else to know about what happened.
No, {playername}, I've no need for a champion right now.
As you wish, {s65}, it shall be done.
{s66}, I fear I cannot help you right now.
You are a true {reg59?lady:gentleman}, {playername}. Thank you so much for helping me
You'll not help a woman in need? You should be ashamed, {playername}... Please leave me. I have some important embroidery to catch up on.
I want to improve my relation with a lord. Can you help me?
{playername}, I don't know you well enough to act on your behalf. I am sorry.
Hmm. I guess you got on the wrong side of somebody. Very well, with whom do you want to restore your relation?
Never mind. I get along with everyone well enough.
Well I can try to help you there. I am sure a few expensive gifts will make {s10} look at you more favorably.

You can improve your relation with {s10} by sending {reg4?her:him} a gift worth {reg10} peningas. But if you can afford spending {reg11} peningas on the gift, it would make a good impression on {reg4?her:him}. And if you can go up to {reg12} peningas, that would really help smooth things out.
I think a gift of {reg10} peningas will do.
Maybe I can afford {reg11} peningas.
In that case, I am ready to spend {reg12} peningas.
I don't think I can afford a gift at the moment.
Excellent. Then I'll choose an appropriate gift for you and send it to {s10} with your compliments. I am sure {reg4?she:he} will appreciate the gesture.
Thank you for your help, madame.
I am afraid that I cannot be of much help in that case, {playername}. I am sorry.
I must beg my leave.
I still don't see why I should accept what you're asking of me.
Then I'll make it worth your while. ({reg8} peningas)
Please, do it for the sake of our friendship. (-{reg9} to relation)
Let me try to convince you. (Persuasion)
Macht nichts.
Mmm, a generous gift to my coffers would certainly help matters... {reg8} peningas should do it. If you agree, then I'll go with your suggestion.
I'm afraid my finances will not allow for such a gift.
Very well, please accept these {reg8} peningas as a token of my gratitude.
Lasst mich etwas länger darüber nachdenken.
Ah. In that case, there is little I can do, unless you have some further argument to make.
My dear {playername}, your generous gift has led me to reconsider what you ask, and I have come to appreciate the wisdom of your proposal.
You've done well by me in the past, {playername}, and for that, I will go along with your request, but know that I do not like you using our relationship this way.
I am sorry, my friend, but I need your help in this.
If it will not please you, then I'll try something else.
All right then, {playername}. I will accept this for your sake. But remember, you owe me for this.
I don't think I owe you such a favor {playername}. I see no reason to accept this for you.
Is this a joke? You've some nerve asking me for favours, {playername}, and let me assure you you'll get none.
Very well. Make your case.
[Attempt to persuade]
Wait. Perhaps there is another way to convince you.
Goodness sake, {playername}! Haven't we talked enough already? I am tired of listening to you, and I do not want to hear any more of it right now.
All right! All right! You have persuaded me to do it. I'll go ahead with what you suggest.
You have a point, {playername}. I admit that much. However, I am not yet convinced I should do as you bid.
Enough, {playername}. You've made a lot of arguments, but I find none of them truly convincing. I stand by what I said before.
Truthfully, {playername}, I fail to see the virtue of your reasoning. What you ask for makes even less sense now than it did before.
I must congratulate you on your victory, my {reg59?lady:lord}. Welcome to {s1}. We, the housekeepers of this castle, are at your service.
Are you the seneschal?

Indeed I am, my {reg59?lady:lord}. I have always served the masters of {s1} to the best of my ability, whichever side they might be on. Thus you may count on my utmost loyalty for as long as you are the {reg59?lady:lord} of this place. Now, do you intend to keep me on as the seneschal? I promise you will not be disappointed.
Very well, you may keep your post for the time being.
You can stay, but I shall be keeping a close watch on you.
Thank you, my {reg59?lady:lord}. If you do not mind my impudence, may I inquire as to what you wish to do with the castle?
I will sell it to another lord.
I intend to claim it for myself.
I haven't given it much thought. What are my options?

According to our laws and traditions, you can do one of several things. First, you could station a garrison here to protect the castle from any immediate counterattacks, then request an audience with some wealthy lord and ask him to make you an offer. It would be worth a tidy sum, believe you me. If you do not wish to sell, then you will have to find yourself a liege lord and protector who would accept homage from you. Without a royal investiture and an army at your back, you would have a difficult time holding on to the castle. Both you and {s1} would become great big targets for any man with a few soldiers and a scrap of ambition.
What do you mean, a liege lord and protector? I won this place by my own hand. I don't need anyone else!

Of course you don't, my {reg59?lady:lord}. However, no lord in the land will recognize your claim to the castle unless it is verified by royal decree. They would call {s1} an outlaw stronghold and take it from you at the earliest opportunity. Surely, not even you could stand against a whole army.
Hmm. I'll give it some thought.

I am very pleased to hear it, my {reg59?lady:lord}. I am only trying to serve you to the best of my ability. Now, if at any time you find you have further need of me, I will be in the great hall arranging a smooth handover of the castle to your forces.
Good day, {reg59?madam:sir}. I do not believe I've seen you here before. Let me extend my welcome to you as the seneschal of {s1}.
A pleasure to meet you, {s65}.
How can I help you?
What exactly do you do here?

Ah, a seneschal's duties are many, good {reg59?woman:sire}. For example, I collect the rents from my lord's estates, I manage the castle's storerooms, I deal with the local peasantry, I take care of castle staff, I arrange supplies for the garrison... All mundane matters on this fief are my responsibility, on behalf of my lord. Everything except commanding the soldiers themselves.
Guten Tag, {reg59?madam:sir}.
Irgendetwas anderes?
I would like to ask you a question...
I wish to know more about someone...
Perhaps I may be able to help. Whom did you have in mind?
Macht nichts.
I must take my leave of you now. Farewell.
I'll do what I can to help, of course. What did you wish to ask?
Perhaps you know where to find someone...
Well, a man in my position does hear a lot of things. Of whom were you thinking?
Macht nichts.
There! I can see the walls of {s3} in the distance. We've made it safely. Here, take this purse of {reg3} peningas, as I promised. I hope we can travel together again someday.
We've made it this far... Is everything clear up ahead?
There might be bandits nearby. Stay close.
Trust me, {playername}. We're already staying as close to you as we can. Lead the way.
No sign of trouble, we can breathe easy.
I'll breathe easy when we reach {s1} and not a moment sooner. Let's keep moving.
What do you want? We paid our toll to you less than three days ago.
Hail, friend.
What do you want? We are but simple merchants. We have no quarrel with you, so leave us alone.
Be warned, knave! This caravan is under the protection of {s9}. Step out of our way or you will face his fury!
Yes? What do you want?
Irgendetwas anderes?
You are trespassing in the territory of the {s17}. I am confiscating this caravan and all its goods!
What? What nonsense is this? We are at peace with the {s17}, and are free to cross its lands!
We'll see about that! Defend yourselves!
Hmm. Maybe this was all a misunderstanding. Farewell.
Ich habe ein Angebot für euch.
Was ist los?
I can escort you to your destination for a price.
Nothing. Forget it
Ich jage eine Gruppe Banditen mit folgender Beschreibung... Habt Ihr sie gesehen?
Tell me about your journey.
We are coming from {s11} and heading to {s12}.{s14}
I demand something from you!
Was wollt Ihr?
There is a toll for free passage here!
Please, I don't want any trouble. I can give you {reg6} peningas. Just let us go.
I don't want any trouble. I can give you {reg6} peningas if you'll let us go.
Agreed. Hand it over and you may go in peace.
Very well then. Here's {reg6} peningas.
I changed my mind. I can't take your money.
No, I want everything you have! [Attack]
Hand over your gold and valuables now!
Nothing. Forget it.
Are you robbing us?{s11}
Robbing you? No, no! It was a joke.
God, don't joke about that, {reg59?lass:lad}. For a moment, I thought we were in real trouble.
Of course I'm robbing you. Now hand over your goods.
Damn you, you won't get anything from us without a fight!
These roads are dangerous indeed. One can never have enough protection.
An escort? We're almost there already! Thank you for the offer, though.
We are heading to {s1}. I will pay you {reg2} peningas if you escort us there.
Agreed.
I want you to stay close to us along the way. We'll need your help if we get ambushed by bandits.
Don't worry. You can trust me.
Good. Come and collect your money when we're within sight of {s1}. For now, let's just get underway.
Vergiss es.
Perhaps another time, then.
Not so fast. First, hand over all your goods and money.
Never. It is our duty to protect these goods. You shall have to fight us, brigand!
[Verlassen]
Good day, my {reg59?lady:lord}. Will you be visiting the prison?
Yes. Unlock the door.
Yes. Unlock the door.
Nein, nicht jetzt.
My {reg59?lady:lord}, just so you know, one of your prisoners is not yet conscious. Do you still desire to enter?
My {reg59?lady:lord}, just so you know, some of your prisoners are not yet conscious. Do you still desire to enter?
Yes, I do.
Nein, nicht jetzt.
Yes? What do you want?
Yes, your majesty?
Who is imprisoned here?
I want to speak with a prisoner.
I order you to release the prisoners.
You're the king, your order is my command, but our lord may take offence to that. Who do you wish to release?
Macht nichts
Wie Ihr wollt.
Currently, {s50} {reg1?are:is} imprisoned here.{s49}
Of course, {reg59?madam:sir}. Go in.
You need to get permission from the lord to talk to prisoners.
There is nobody inside. Therefore, you can freely go inside and look around.
All right, then I'll take a look at the prison.
I have more important business to do.
All right, then I'll try that.
Come on now. I thought you were the boss here.
Heh-heh. You got that right. Still, I can't let you into the prison.
All right, then I'll leave now.
I found a purse with 100 peningas a few paces away. I reckon it belongs to you.

Ah! I was looking for this all day. How good of you to bring it back, {reg59?madam:sir}. Well, now that I know what an honest {reg59?lady:man} you are, there can be no harm in letting you inside for a look. Go in... Just so you know, though -- I'll be hanging onto the keys, in case you were thinking about undoing anyone's chains.
Give me the keys to the cells -- now!
Help! Help! Prison break!
Macht nichts.
Your orders, {reg59?Lady:Lord}?
Open the door. I'll go in.
Macht nichts.
Get out of my sight, beggar! You stink!
Get lost before I lose my temper, you vile beggar!
I want to enter the hall and speak to the lord.
[Verlassen]
Are you out of your mind, {reg59?woman:man}? Beggars are not allowed into the hall. Now get lost or I'll beat you bloody.
Was wollt Ihr?
I want to enter the hall and speak to the lord.
Macht nichts.
I'm afraid there is a feast in progress, and you are not invited.
You can go in after leaving your weapons with me. No one is allowed to carry arms into the lord's hall.
Dann können Sie nicht hineingehen .
No, I give my arms to no one.
Dann können Sie nicht hineingehen .
Was wollt Ihr?
Ja?
We need shelter for the night. Will you let us in?
I want to speak with the lord of the castle.
I want to speak with someone in the castle.
[Verlassen]
Wait here. {s2} will see you.
Mein Herr ist jetzt nicht hier.
Wer ist das?
Macht nichts.
Wait there. I'll send him your request.
Ich warte...
{reg59?Madam:Sir}, {s2} will talk to you now.
{s2} says he will not see you. Begone now.
My lord {s2} will be happy to see you {reg59?madam:sir}. Come on in. I am opening the gates for you.
My lord {s2} is not in the castle now. But I think he would approve of you taking shelter here. Come on in. I am opening the gates for you.
Come on in. I am opening the gates for you.
Come on in. But make sure your men behave sensibly within the walls. My lord {s2} does not want trouble here.
My lord {s2} does not want you here. Begone now.
You have come just in time. Let us join our forces now and teach our enemy a lesson.
You are making a big mistake by fighting against us.
I don't think we have met properly my friend. You just saved my life out there, and I still don't know your name...
Your help was most welcome stranger. My name is {s1}. Can I learn yours?
Thanks for your help, stranger. We haven't met properly yet, have we? What is your name?
Mein Name ist {Spielername }.
Well met indeed, {playername}. My name is {s1}, and I am forever in your debt. If there is ever anything I can help you with, just let me know...
Well met, {playername}. I am in your debt for what you just did. I hope one day I will find a way to repay it.
Well met, {playername}. I am {s1}. Thanks for your help and I hope we meet again.
Again you save our necks, {playername}! Truly, you are the best of friends. {s43}
You arrived just in the nick of time, {playername}! You have my deepest thanks! {s43}
You turned up just in time, {playername}. I will not forget your help. {s43}
Gut sie hier zu sehen,{playername}. {s43}
Thank you for your help, {reg59?madam:sir}. You saved {reg1?our lives:my life} out there.
Thank you for your help {reg59?madam:sir}. Things didn't look very well for us but then you came up and everything changed.
Thank you for your help, {reg59?madam:sir}. It was fortunate to have you nearby.
Oh, {reg59?madam:sir}, thank you so much for rescuing me. Will you take me to my family now?
I am in your debt for freeing me, friend.
You're not going anywhere. You'll be my prisoner now!
Alas. Will my luck never change?
Es steht ihnen frei zu gehen,{s65}.
Habt Dank, teure/r {reg59?lady:sire}. Ich vergesse niemanden, der mir einen Dienst erwiesen hat.
Would you like to join me?
All right, I will join you.
No, I want to go on my own.
You'll not live long to enjoy your victory. My kinsmen will soon wipe out the stain of this defeat.
Du bist jetzt mein Gefangener.
Damn you. You will regret this.
You're free to go this time, but don't cross my path again.
Wir werden uns wieder sehen.
I think that is a wise move. Good luck to you.

Your relations with {s4} are not all that they could be. As {reg4?she:he} is my {s11}, I can mediate to attempt to mend your quarrel. Perhaps the best way for me to do this would be to send {reg4?her:him} a gift, perhaps, if I may suggest, some bracelets and brooches, and a length of silver fox fur. If you can provide me with these items, I can have them sent to {reg4?her:him} on your behalf.
Splendid. I shall await the materials.

As you may realize, {s4} has many enemies among the lords of the {s5}. In particular, they feel that {reg4?she:he} is {s7}, and worry that {reg4?she:he} will {s8}. Were you to denounce {s4} to {reg4?her:his} face, you may reap much popularity -- although, of course, you would make an enemy of {reg4?her:him} and risk being challenged to a duel.

As you may realize, many of us in the peerage of the {s5} consider {s4} to be {s7}, and a liability to our cause. We worry that {reg4?she:he} will {s8}. People know my views on {s4} already, but if you were to denounce {reg4?her:him} to {reg4?her:his} face, you would further erode his standing -- and discourage our liege from entrusting {reg4?her:him} with any more power or responsibility. Of course, you would make an enemy of {reg4?her:him} and risk being challenged to a duel.{s9}
We appreciate what you are doing. I find such intrigues distasteful, but it is all for the good of the {s5}.
Very well. It is always risky to involve yourself in intrigues of this sort, but in this case, I think you will benefit.

You and I have a common interest in seeking to curtail the rise of {s4}. I feel that {reg4?she:he} is {s7}, and worry that {reg4?she:he} will {s8}. Were you to tell our liege {s9} your opinion of {s4}, it might discourage {s9} from granting {s4} any further powers or responsibilities, at least for a while, and I would be much obliged to you.
We appreciate what you are doing. I find such intrigues distasteful, but it is all for the good of the {s5}.
I cannot think of anything right now, but we will have some items of mutual interest in the future.
Ich mag diese Idee.
Hmm... Maybe you can think of something else.
Let us discuss another topic
Sehr gut.
Sehr gut.
Sehr gut.
Sehr gut.
Mercy! Please don't kill me!
I have nothing against you man. But {s2} wants you dead. Sorry.
Damn you! May you burn in Hell!
I'll let you live, if you promise me...
Of course, I promise, I'll do anything. Just spare my life...
You are going to forget about {s2}'s debt to you. And you will sign a paper stating that he owes you nothing.
Yes, of course. I'll do as you say.
And if my lord hears so much of a hint of a complaint about this issue, then I'll come back for you, and it won't matter how much you scream for mercy then. Do you understand me?
Yes {reg59?madam:sir}. Don't worry. I won't make any complaint.
Good. Go now, before I change my mind.
Was wollt Ihr?
I am looking for a murderer by the name of {s4}. You fit his description.
Nothing. Sorry to trouble you.
I don't understand, {reg59?madam:sir}. I never killed anyone. I think you've got the wrong man.
Then drop your sword. If you are innocent, you have nothing to fear. We'll go now and talk to your neighbours, and if they verify your story, I'll go on my way.
I'm not going anywhere, friend. You're going to have to fight for your silver, today.
No problem. I really just need your head, anyway.
I come not for money, but to execute the law!
Alas, that you cannot be made to see reason.
Die, dog!
Was wollt Ihr?
I am looking for a {s13} stolen from {s9} of {s3}. You look like the fellow I am looking for.
Nothing. Sorry to trouble you.
I don't understand, {reg59?madam:sir}. I never stole anything. I think you've got the wrong man.
Then come with me. If you are innocent, you have nothing to fear. We'll go now and talk to {s9} of {s3}, and if he says you are not the man who stole his {s13}, you'll be free to go.
I'm not going anywhere, friend. You're going to have to fight for your silver today.
No problem. Too bad you can't see reason.
Die, scum!
Who the hell are you? What do you want?
I told you everything I know. Now leave me alone!
My name is {playername}. Sound familiar? I have some questions for you.
My name is {playername}. Sound familiar? I came to fetch your head.
Well, you asked for it, {playername}!
Questions? I am not going to answer any questions, and I have no idea who you are!
This is the last warning: answer me or die!
I've had enough of you! Prepare to die!
Now I recognize you, {playername}. I'll answer your questions if you spare my life.
I still don't know who you are and what you are talking about. I'll try to answer your questions, but stop threatening me.

I was attacked by some thugs not so long ago. I managed to dispose of the attackers and found a note saying to meet a contact in {s3}. Both you and I know you are that contact. I really don't care about you, but rather need to know who ordered this and why.
Alright, if you promise to let me go... 'Twas {s9} of {s10}. Don't ask me why; I don't know.
I am sorry to hear about your mishaps, but I have nothing to tell you. Be gone now.
Thanks! You've both helped me and saved yourself. Be gone now.
Then prepare to die!
Sorry to bother you, sir.
Excuse me, {playername}? Don't tell me you believe everything people say on the street. People who want to bring me down or destroy our friendship spread those rumors.
True, most rumors are nothing more than lies. Not, in this case though. I have met someone who told me all about your involvement in this matter. Would you like to meet him too?

Hmm, you see, {playername}, it wasn't really my choice. Some lords are not very happy with your rise in power, so they all ordered me to organize this err... accident. What could I do? I didn't want to do this, but what choice did I have?
So what, {playername}? No one likes you. You are nothing more than a stupid upstart among us real nobles! Too bad those idiots couldn't finish the job!

Well, {playername}, welcome to real world. If you rise fast, be prepared to pay the price. Some lords are unhappy with you, and I guarantee this is not the last time something like that happens, so be prepared. Don't say I didn't warn you.
Whatever the reason, I demand satisfaction.
Then it's my duty to inform your liege of your criminal deeds.
I apologize. I acted rashly.
Sorry, I don't have that kind of money
Fine, {playername}. I will give you the money, although you come across as a blackmailer.
Sorry, {playername}, you sound like a dirty blackmailer, and I don't pay them no matter what.
{playername}, you are nothing but a dirty blackmailer, and I have no choice but to defend my honor.
Well, I think that {reg22} peningas is a bit too much. How about {reg23}?
Just like I thought of you, {playername}: full of greed. Here, take your dirty money!
I will never pay such a low life like you, {playername}! I have no choice but to fight such scum, but heaven knows someone has to do the dirty job!
I will never pay such a low life like you, {playername}! I have no choice but to fight such scum, but heaven knows someone has to do the dirty job!
Ha-ha-ha, what is this? Extortion? Prepare to fight!
Ha-ha-ha, what is this? Extortion? Prepare to fight!
I don't like it, but I guess I have to pay you off.
Ha-ha-ha, what is this? Extortion? Prepare to fight!
Ha-ha-ha, what is this? Extortion? Prepare to fight!
I don't like it, but I guess I have to pay you off. Watch your back, though!
Nice doing business with you.
I forgive you
Marvellous. Let's go.
When it comes to honor, bargaining is inappropriate. {reg22} peningas it is.
Then {reg23} peningas will do.
Here is the money. I will take care of that village idiot myself.
Argh! Aren't you a little scummy tattle teller! I have to teach you a lesson!
Argh! Aren't you a little scummy tattle teller! I have to teach you a lesson!
Ok, I changed my mind. I will take the money instead.
My honor is not for sale. Your liege needs to know about your dirty deeds.
That's an insult. I demand satisfaction!
You will tell my liege no such thing!
You will tell my liege no such thing!
Ich nehme das Geld.
Ich vergebe dir.
This is unacceptable! I demand satisfaction!
Yes {reg59?madam:sir}?
Take this letter to {s1} and give it to {s2}.
Nothing. Nothing at all.
Yes {reg59?madam:sir}. You can trust me. I will not fail you.
Good. I will not forget your service. You will be rewarded when you return.
Arggh! I can't do this. I can't send you to your own death!
What do you mean, {reg59?madam:sir}?
There's a trap set up for you in the town. {s3} ordered me to sacrifice one of my chosen warriors to fool the enemy, but he will just need to find another way.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}. I will follow you to the gates of hell. But this would not be a good death.
Don't worry, {reg59?madam:sir}, I'm on my way.
Good day, {reg59?madam:sir}. Such fine weather, don't you think? If you'll excuse me now, I must go on my way.
In the name of {s1}, you are under arrest!
Mich bekommt ihr nicht lebend!
Ignoriert mich. Ich bin nur auf der Durchreise.
Grüße
In the name of {s1}, you are under arrest!
Zuerst müsst Ihr uns besiegen!
Ignoriert mich. Ich bin nur auf der Durchreise.
Guten Tag, {reg59?madam:sir}.
I have been sent by your {s4}, whom you are running from. He will not punish you if you return now.

My good {reg59?madam:sir}. Our lives at our village {s1} was unbearable. We worked all day long and still went to bed hungry. And now this swine, our lord, forced us to become warriors! We are going to {s6} to start a new life, where we will be treated like humans.
You have gone against our laws by running from your bondage. You will go back to {s1} now!
Well, maybe you are right. All right, then, but if anyone asks, I haven't seen you.
All right, {reg59?madam:sir}. As you wish. We'll head back to {s5} now.
God bless you, {reg59?madam:sir}. We will not forget your help.
Good day and many thanks, {reg59?madam:sir}. Don't worry. If anyone asks, we haven't seen you.
I have changed my mind. You must back to your village!
Good. Go quickly now, before I change my mind.
Good day {reg59?madam:sir}. We were heading back to {s5}, but I am afraid we lost our way.
Do not test my patience. You are going back now!
Well, if you are that eager to go, then go.
We are on our way back to {s5} {reg59?madam:sir}.
Make haste now. The sooner you return the better.
Good. Keep going.
Yes {reg59?madam:sir}. As you wish.
This must be your unlucky day, mate. We're just about the worst people you could run into, in these parts.
This must be your unlucky day, mate. We're just about the worst people you could run into in these parts.
Heh. For me, you are nothing more than walking moneybags. {s1} offered me good money for your heads.
Heh. For me, you are nothing more than walking moneybags. A merchant in {s1} offered me good money for your heads.
A bounty hunter! I hate bounty hunters! Kill {reg59?her:him}! Kill {reg59?her:him} now!
What do you want? You want to pay us some more money?
Sorry to trouble you. I'll be on my way now.
Yeah. Stop fooling around and go make some money. I want to see that purse full next time I see you.
No. It's your turn to pay me this time.
What nonsense are you talking about? You want trouble? You got it.
We are the free brothers. We will fight only for ourselves from now on. Now give us your gold or taste our steel.
When I'm done with you, you'll regret ever leaving your lord.
There's no need to fight. I am ready to pay for free passage.
Do you know whom you address? I will not kill you if you join me.
Ich schere mich recht wenig darüber wer Ihr seid. Es ist Zeit für Euch zu sterben.
Yes, I've heard of you. They say your men collect the best loot. Forgive us, and we will be delighted to join such a fierce leader
We would consider your offer if you fronted us {reg0} peningas.
It is a good bargain, considering your proven head busting skills. Welcome to the band, lads.
Ich habe nicht genug Geld...
Autsch! Sie überschätzen Ihren Wert, dünkt mich. Vergiss es.
Why, you are just the sort of gentle lads I dream of accompanying me!
Never mind. On second thought, we have enough lads to split the wealth with.
Ooh. Well, we'll let you do the valuating then.
Not to worry, dearie. We'll reduce that number for you!
Wir werden Sie in Ruhe lassen.

Good. You are clever. Now, having a look at your baggage, I reckon a fellow like you could pretty easily afford {reg5} peningas. We wouldn't want to be too greedy, now would we? Pay us, and then you can go.
All right, here's your {reg5} peningas.
I don't have that much money with me
Too bad. Then we'll have to sell you to the slavers.
Heh. That wasn't difficult, now, was it? All right, you may go.
Irgendetwas anderes?
I was told to deliver to you {reg9} units of {s4}.

At last! My stock was almost depleted. I had paid the cost of the {s4} in advance. Here, take these {reg5} peningas. That should cover your pay. And give {s9} my regards. I'll put in a good word for you next time I deal with him.
I was told to deliver to you {reg9} units of {s4}, but I lost some of the cargo on the way.

Attacked by bandits, eh? You are lucky they left you alive. Anyway, I can pay no more than {reg5} peningas for this. You can be sure, though, that I will let {s1} know that the delivery was short. They will probably charge you for the loss.
I was told to deliver to you {reg9} units of {s4}, but I lost the cargo on the way.
What? I have been waiting for that {s4} for weeks, and now you tell me that you lost it? You may rest assured that I will let {s1} know about this.
Ich möchte eine Nachricht verschicken.
We can do that. Who do you want to sent it to? I've heard the following are nearby:
No, none of those. Later, perhaps.
Sehr gut. Was ist die Botschaft?
It is this...
I'd like to buy every man who comes in here tonight a jar of your best mead.
Of course, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. I reckon {reg5} peningas should be enough for that. What should I tell the lads?
Let everyone know of the generosity of {playername} to the people of {s10}.
Actually, forget this.
Don't worry {reg59?madam:sir}. Your name will be cheered and toasted here all night.
I'd like to buy me and my men a barrel of your best ale.
Of course, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. I reckon {reg5} peningas should be enough for that. What should I tell the lads?
The price is fair enough. Let my men have at it.
Don't worry {reg59?madam:sir}. Your men will enjoy their pints.
Actually, forget this.
Have you heard of anyone in this realm who might have a job for a {reg59?woman:man} like me?
Hmm... Well, {s10} is often looking for mercenaries to fight in his wars.{s9}
Where can I get special weapons and armor?
Hmm... Well, there are talented blacksmiths that can make them. But, if you want to know their names, you must pay me fifty peningas for the information.
Sicher. Spreche!
Sie sind eine Ratte. Lebt wohl!

Well, several towns can boast of talented blacksmiths: Eadwine of Dunwic,^Donnchadh of Scuin,^Paega of Witan Ceaster,^Lifris of Bosvenegh,^Fearchair of Ceall Cainnigh,^Atli of Tunsberg,^Harenbili of Dun Breatann,^Egil of Dubh Linn,^Godgyfu Cirren Ceaster,^and Uormuin of Caer Dyf.
Vielen Dank. Lebt wohl!
Lassen Sie mich etwas mehr nachdenken ...
I have heard that {s7} {s9}{s10} You may want to speak with {reg4?her:him}.

There may be other work, of course -- lords and village mayors often have other tasks which we don't hear about. Also, the villages around here frequently need help, although they'd be more likely to pay you with a wedge of cheese and goodwill than with cold hard peningas.
I'll keep my ears open for other opportunities. You may want to ask again from time to time.
Irgendwelche Nachrichten in diesem Teil der Welt?
I guess it's not exactly news, but the world is becoming increasingly dangerous. The roads are full of bandits.
Ein Sturm zieht auf. Es ist nicht Blitz und Donner , sondern Krieg.
They say that Hild is now the most beautiful woman in all of Englaland. That's why she never comes here anymore! (wink)
Bards say that King Aelle of Bernaccia ordered Ragnar to be thrown into a pit of vipers. That's why his sons are now attacking Englaland.
When Aethelwulf of West Seaxe died, Aethelbald, his eldest son, married Judith, his widow! Ach, that's what queens are for, eh?
Recently, Aelfred, secundarius of West Seaxe, married Ealhswith, daughter of Aethelred Mucil, ealdorman of the Gaini, and of Lady Eadburh. That puts him in the royal line of the Mercians.
It's no secret that Harald of Norway aims to be king of all Norwegians so he can marry a certain princess. He's vowed not to comb his hair until then.
In the Kingdom of Alban, the king has trouble resolving disputes between Picts and Goidels. They seem to be always at war with each other.
I have not heard anything notable to tell.
Habt Dank.
Ich denke ich sollte jetzt gehen.
Greetings to you, {reg59?madam:sir}. You look like someone who should get to know me.
Warum das?

I broker ransoms for the poor wretches who are captured in these endless wars. Normally I travel between the salt mines and the slave markets on the coast, on commission from those whose relatives have gone missing. But if I'm out on my errands of mercy, and I come across a fellow dragging around a captive or two, well, there's no harm in a little speculative investment, is there? And you look like the type who might have a prisoner to sell.
Was ist, wenn ihre Familien nicht bezahlen kann?

Oh, then I spin them a few heartwarming tales of life on the galleys. You'd be surprised what sorts of treasures a peasant can dig out of his cowshed or wheedle out of his cousins, assuming he's got the proper motivation! If, in the end, they cannot come up with the silver, then there are always slave merchants who are looking for galley slaves. One cannot do Heaven's work with an empty purse, you see.
Was kann ich für einen Gefangenen bekommen?

It varies. I fancy that I have a fine eye for assessing a ransom. There are a dozen little things about a man that will tell you whether he goes to bed hungry, or dines each night on soft dumplings and goose. The real money of course is in the gentry, and if you ever want to do my job you'll want to learn about every landowning family in the Northlands, their estates, their heraldry, their offspring both lawful and bastard, and, of course, their credit with the merchants.
Would you be able to ransom me if I were taken?

Of course. I'm welcome in every court in the Northlands. There are not many who can say that! So always be sure to keep a pot of peningas buried somewhere, and a loyal servant who can find it in a hurry.
Das ist alles, was ich wissen muss. Vielen Dank.
Grüße. Wenn Sie irgendwelche Gefangenen haben, werde ich glücklich sein, sie von Ihnen zu kaufen.
Wie auch immer, wenn Sie irgendwelche Gefangenen haben, werde ich glücklich sein, sie von Ihnen zu kaufen.
Dann sollten Sie besser Ihren Geldbeutel bringen. Ich habe Gefangene zu verkaufen.\n
Ich möchte alle meine Gefangenen verkaufen.
Well, come back when you have more slaves for me.
Tell me about what you do again.
I wish to ransom one of my companions.
Whom do you wish to ransom?
Macht nichts

Let me check my ledger, here... Yes. Your friend is being held in the dungeon at {s7}. How interesting! I remember hearing that the rats down there are unusually large -- like mastiffs, they say... Now... For the very reasonable sum of {reg5} peningas, which includes both the ransom and my commission and expenses, we can arrange it so that {s5} can once again enjoy {reg4?her:his} freedom. What do you say?
Hier ist dein Geld.
Ich kann mir das jetzt nicht leisten.
Splendid! In a few days, I would think, you should find {s5} riding to rejoin you, blinking in the sunlight and no doubt very grateful! Is there any other way in which I can help you?

Of course, of course... Never mind what they say about the rats, by the way -- I've never actually seen one myself, on account of the pitch-black darkness. Anyway, I'm sure that {s5} will understand why it's important for you to control expenditures. Now... Was there anything else?
Not this time. Farewell.
Ich möchte sehen, was Sie haben...
I will be staying here for a few days. Let me know if you need my services.

Greetings, friend. You look like the kind of {reg59?person:man} who'd do well to know me. I travel a lot all across the Northlands and keep an open ear. I can provide you information that you might find useful. For a meager price of course.
Greetings, {playername}. I saw your companion {s10} at in a mead hall in {s11} some days ago. I thought you might like to know.
Thanks. I'll go and find {reg3?her:him} there.
Thanks, but I don't really care.
Greetings, {playername}.
Ja?
What can you tell me about this land?

The Northlands is divided into many kingdoms that can neither manage to live in peace with their neighbours nor eliminate them. As a result, there's seldom a break in the bitter wars that plague this land and drain its lifeblood. Well, at least this ought to be a good place to be for an adventurer such as you. With some luck and skill, you can make a name for yourself here, amass a fortune perhaps, or gain great power. Opportunities are endless, and so are the rewards, if you are willing to risk your life for them.
Tell me more about these opportunities.
Thank you. That was all I needed to know
Well, you probably know everything I could tell you already. You seem to be doing pretty well.

The kingdoms will pay good money for mercenaries if they are engaged in a war. If you have done a bit of fighting, speaking with one of their lords will probably result in being offered a mercenary contract.^^Better rewards come if you can manage to become a vassal to a king. A vassal can own villages, castles and towns and get rich with the taxes and revenues of these estates. Normally, only nobles of the realm own land in this way, but in time of war, a king will not hesitate to accept someone who distinguishes {reg59?herself:himself} on the battlefield as a vassal, and grant {reg59?her:him} the right to own land.

It is not unheard-of for adventurers to renounce allegiance to a king altogether, declare themselves kings, and claim land in their own name. This is a difficult path, however, as the great nobles of the land, with their long ancestries, are not likely to accept such upstarts as their monarch. Such rulers would need to be very careful in establishing their right to rule, or they would be set upon from all sides.

It might be easier for an adventurer like you to pledge support to an existing king's rival. There are many such pretenders in the Northlands -- those who are born to the right family, who go around and stir up trouble saying they have a better claim to the throne than the current king does. If those claim holders could find supporters, they could easily start civil wars and perhaps even replace the king one day.
Interesting. Where can I find these claim holders?
I guess I heard enough already. Thank you.

A claim holder's life would be in danger in his own country of course. Therefore, they usually stay at rival courts, raising support and hoping to find someone willing to champion their cause. I usually hear news about some of them, and may be able to tell you their location with some precision. But of course, I would ask for a little something for such a service.
I want to know the location of a claimant.
Whose location do you want to know?
Macht nichts.
I can reveal this information to you for a small price. Let's say 30 peningas.
In Ordnung, hier sind dreißig Peningas.
Macht nichts.
{s15} is currently at {s11}.
I am looking for one of my companions...
Maybe I can help you. Who are you looking for?
Macht nichts.
I guess I know where {s15} is. For 30 peningas, I'll tell you.
In Ordnung, hier sind dreißig Peningas.
Macht nichts.
{s15} is currently at {s11}.{s12}
I know you travel a lot. Could you spread some rumors while travelling?
Hmm, everything is possible, for the right price, of course. What kind of rumors do you have in mind?
I would like you to spread rumors about a lord's disloyalty.
I would like you to spread rumors about a lord's indiscretion.
Ich möchte nur ein Streit zwischen zwei Herren starten.
Which lord from {s32} do you have in mind?
Macht nichts.
Very well. Do you want to spread rumors about {s31}?
Very well. What is the second lord's faction?
Which lord from the {s32} do you have in mind?
Very well. Do you want to start a quarrel between {s31} and {s35}?
Yes, that is exactly what I want you to do.
Very well. I will try to sow some rumors per your wish. Check back in a week to see if the rumors are working.
Entschuldigung, ich habe das Geld nicht.
Ich habe gerade meine Meinung geändert.
Greetings. They say you're the kind of {reg59?woman:man} who'd be interested to hear that I travel frequently to the {s17}. I'll tell you all I know for a mere 100 peningas.
Here's 100 peningas. Tell me what you know.
Tut mir leid, mein Freund. Ich bin nicht interessiert.
Well, that's all I can tell you. Farewell.
Leb wohl.
Good day {reg59?madam:sir}, will you be looking at my books?
Yes. Show me what you have for sale.
Of course {reg59?madam:sir}.
Irgendetwas anderes?
Nichts. Danke.
I like your weapons, but I need something more... special.
Aber natürlich, {reg59?madam:sir}.
Sorry, friend, but my art is for the men of fame only. Come back when you've made a name for yourself (600 renown).
I sell specialty items. I can make a noble sword or elite spear, or I can sell you an axe from Frankia, and more... The quality depends on the material that I have today. What would you like?
Ich hätte gerne das Schwert. Ich werde es Witwenmacher nennen (13000 Pfennige).
Den Speer, bitte (8000 Pfennige).
I'd like the Frankish axe. It's a symbol of wealth (11000 peningas).
Ich hätte gerne etwas anderes. Überrascht mich (4 Optionen, 10000 Pfennige).
Nichts. Danke.
Viel Glück. Erinnert Euch an meinen Namen, wenn Ihr sonst noch etwas braucht. Auf Wiedersehen.
I like your armors, but I need something more... special.
Sure thing, {reg59?madam:sir}.
Sorry, friend, but my art is for the men of fame only. Come back when you've made a name for yourself (600 renown).

I sell specialty items. I can sell you a suit of mail from Frankia. If you need a helmet, I can make you a noble helmet or a hersir helmet, and more... The quality depends on the material that I have today. What would you like?
The mail, please. I'd like to have it (17000 peningas).
I'd like the noble helm. It's a symbol of wealth (9000 peningas).
I'd like the hersir helm. I love how it accentuates my facial features (12000 peningas).
Ich hätte gerne etwas anderes. Überrascht mich (4 Optionen, 19000 Pfennige).
Nichts. Danke.
Viel Glück. Erinnert Euch an meinen Namen, wenn Ihr sonst noch etwas braucht. Auf Wiedersehen.
Hello, {reg59?my lady:my lord} - she smiles and looks at you provocatively -, How can I serve you?
Ich stehe Euch zu Verfügung, {playername}.
Ich muss die Moral meiner Männer erhöhen.
Ich will nicht alles für meine Mannen. Ich hätte gerne euren Betrieb.
Ich bin nicht interessiert. Lebt wohl.
Eure Männer werden ein großes Fest haben, mit Frauen die besten Met und Essen servieren, und Barden... Es wird Sie 1500 Pfennige kosten.
Ich denke meine Männer haben es sich verdient. Dieses Mal.
Alas, my lady, your charms are beyond the reach of my purse.
Nice. You like me, {reg59?my lady:my lord}, don't you? Well, for you, there is a special price of only 100 coins. As a token of our 'friendship'...
Großartig, nehmt diese Münzen als "Geschenk".
Nein danke, Ihr versucht mich auszubeuten.

(Time passes, and you forget the rigors and fatigue from the journey that had lingered upon your body and soul. For a few hours, your armor and sword, the fear of dying in any skirmish, the punishment of the rain and wind, and the dust of the roads are all shoved under a small patch of happiness. But, in the end, it ends all too soon, when your 'friend' quietly leaves the room.)
Greetings to you, {reg59?most noble lady:most noble sir}.
What is it that you do?
I have some questions about courtship in these lands.
Can you teach me any poems?

I can teach you the tale of Aeneas and Dido, from the Aeneid. It is an allegoric poem that describes how Dido, the Queen of Carthage, fell in love, under the influence of the gods, with the Trojan hero Aeneas. When reminded by Jupiter, he leaves his lover to fulfill his duty to found a new city, Dido commits suicide, cursing Aeneas and calling down revenge in a symbolic anticipation of the fierce wars between Carthage and Rome. Its theme -- of strong love separated by fate and cursed by suicide -- is appreciated by some noble ladies, but not all.

I can teach you The Voyage of Bran. This Goidelic saga can be interpreted either erotically or prophetically. Bran, son o Fedbal, and his expedition of twenty-one companions journey to a distant island of luxury and pleasure. Upon return, he learns that ages have passed, and he and his expedition have already passed into myth. He can never again touch the soil of his homeland and sails off again. I believe that it appeals to women of a certain romantic temperament, but you risk scandalizing or boring others.

I can teach you the tragic tale of Orpheus, son of Morpheus and the muse Calliope. It is a sad and powerful story. He travels to the Underworld to bring back Euridyce, his deceased wife, but is unable to obey the condition imposed by Hades and Persephone. Hear me.

I can teach you the saga of Beowulf. It is a heroic tale, full of blood and battle. Beowulf, a hero of the Geats, battles three powerful antagonists: Grendel, a horrid monster, who has been attacking the resident warriors of the mead hall of Hrodgar, king of the Danish, Grendel's mother, and a terrible dragon. Hear me.

I can teach you the Aesopica, the famous fables of Aesop. The tales of this slave and storyteller usually feature animals, and are both comical, satirizing man and animal, and moral, for its practical lessons on life. Pay you heed.
To teach it to you, I will need some hours of your time -- and, of course, a small fee for my services. About 300 peningas would suffice.
I believe you already know the poems I am best equipped to teach.
Yes -- teach me that one
Macht nichts

Very well -- repeat after me:^But anxious cares already seized the queen^She fed within her veins a flame unseen^The hero's valor, acts, and birth inspire^Her soul with love, and fan the secret fire...

Very well -- repeat after me:^There is a distant isle,^Around which sea-horses glisten^A fair course against the white-swelling surge,^Four feet uphold it.^A delight of the eyes, a glorious range,^Is the plain on which the hosts hold games^Coracle contends against chariot^In southern Mag Findargat...
