Yes, my {reg59?lady:lord}, you really should be excited. Judging from the sparkles in your eyes, you are really up to this little challenge, aren't you? We are, too, your Highness, as it will relieve our men of their anxiety. Your help, of course, will be duly appreciated.
My {reg59?lady's:lord's} intuition is second to none. What kind of reward can you smell?
Cash, my good man. {reg25} of it, give or take.
Vielleicht hast Du recht. Was ist denn für mich drin?
I'm sure my efforts will be appreciated, but I'd like something more tangible, like cash.
Yes, I will help you, but I would require something more tangible than appreciation.
Sorry, but you failed to convince me.
Oh, I see. {reg59?Her ladyship:His lordship} desires coins. How many would {reg59?she:he} like?
I think {reg25} peningas would suffice.
I think we can settle on {reg25} peningas.
I think you misunderstood me. I don't need your money. How many women do you need?
{reg25} Pfenninge - Ich denke, Eure Stadt kann diese Menge vertragen.
Hmmm, alright, {reg25} peningas will do. How many women do you need?
Hmmm, {reg25} peningas is far too little. I have better things to do. Good day.
I think {reg5} women will be enough for now.
Then I will go and find you the women you need.
Ich befürchte, dass ich dafür derzeit keine Zeit habe. Ihr müsst jemand anderen dafür um Hilfe bitten.
Thank you, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. May your paths guide you to the best women.
Indeed. I have brought you {reg5} women, as you requested.

My good {reg59?lady:lord}, you are a true savior for our village. We cannot thank you enough, but you'll always be in our prayers. The men of {s13} will not forget what you have done for us. We will all name our first {reg59?daughter:son} after you!
My good {reg59?lady:lord}, please, is there anything I can do for you?

One of our slaves has overwhelmed his owner and fled. You look like a {reg59?woman:man} of war strong enough to capture him. Would you be able to find him and bring him back? He cannot have gone far. He must be hiding somewhere next to the village.
Ich werde ihn finden und zurück bringen.
Ich bin kein Sklavenjäger.
Ich befürchte, dass ich dafür jetzt keine Zeit habe.
You will? Oh, splendid! Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}. He must be hiding somewhere near our village.
Ja natürlich {reg59?madam:sir}. Nungut, wir werden jemand anderen für diesen Auftrag finden.
Grüße, Reisender.
Seid gegrüßt. Was tut Ihr hier, mitten im Nirgendwo?
Ich bin aus einem Dorf in der Nähe geflüchtet und verstecke mich hier, bis ich mich entschieden habe was ich als nächstes tun soll.
Noch etwas, was Sie wissen wollen?
Warum bist Du geflüchtet?
Mein Herr hat mich geschlagen und das mehr als nur einmal. Ich konnte nicht länger dort bleiben.
Ich bin hier, um dich zu deinem Herren zurück zu bringen.
Ich flehe euch an, {reg59?madam:sir}. Alles nur das nicht. Dort erwartet mich nur der Tod.
Euer Schicksal kümmert mich nicht im geringsten. Folgt mir.
Wenn Dich sowieso nur der Tod erwartet, töte ich Dich gleich hier.
In diesem Falle werde ich mich verteidigen.
Tretet meiner Armee bei und Ihr müsst nicht wieder zu Eurem Herren zurück.
Dann verschwindet jetzt. Ich werde so tun, als hätte ich Euch nicht gesehen.
Vielen, vielen Dank {reg59?madam:sir}!

We are suffering greatly at the hands of a group of bandits. They take our food and livestock, and kill anyone who doesn't obey them immediately. Our men are angry that we cannot defend ourselves, but we are only simple farmers... However, with some help, I think that some of the people here could be more than that. We just need an experienced warrior to teach us how to fight.
Ich kann Euch beibringen, wie Ihr euch selbst verteidigen könnt.
Ihr Bauern habt mit Waffen nichts am Hut. Bezahlt einfach die Banditen und findet euch damit ab.

You will? Oh, splendid! We would be deeply indebted to you, {reg59?madam:sir}. I'll instruct the village folk to assemble here and receive your training. If you can teach us how to defend ourselves, I promise you'll receive everything we can give you in return for your efforts.
Yes, of course {reg59?madam:sir}. Thank you for your counsel.
Bandits have driven away our cattle. Our pastures are empty. If we had just a few head of cattle, we could start to raise a herd again.
Wie viele Tiere benötigt Ihr?
Ich habe dafür keine Zeit. Fragt jemand anderen um Hilfe.
I think {reg5} head of cattle will suffice for a small herd.
Then I will bring you the cattle you need.
Ich befürchte, dass ich dafür derzeit keine Zeit habe. Ihr müsst jemand anderen dafür um Hilfe bitten.
Danke Euch, {reg59?madam:sir}. Wir werden Tag und Nacht für Euch beten.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}, of course. I am sorry to have bothered you with our troubles.
Thank you, {reg59?madam:sir}, but we do not really need anything right now.
{reg59?My lady:My lord}, you honour my humble shop with your presence.
Welcome {reg59?madam:sir}. What can I do for you?
Irgendetwas anderes?
Hogni, der Hafenmeister von Ribe, sendet Euch diese Fälle.
Endlich! Ich warte schon seit Wochen auf die Lieferung. Danke, aber erwartet kein Trinkgeld. Die Lieferung war viel zu spät.
Ein Mann namens Reginhard schickte mich, um Euch zu sehen.
Ich weiß, wer Reginhard ist. Und es ist kein Name dem ich wohlgesonnen bin. Ich habe keine Zeit für seine Gesandten.
Wait! I just want to make a donation to the widows and orphans in this town.
{s2}^^Err, I do not expect this from Reginhard. How much is your donation? We accept 100, 300 and 600 peningas.
These children deserve a better future. Donate 600 peningas.
Ich denke, 300 Pfenninge werden vielen Familien über den nächsten Winter helfen.
Ich möchte 100 Pfennige spenden.
Ich habe nicht genügend Geld um eine ausreichende Spende zu machen. Ich komme später wieder.
{s2}^^Many people will be grateful to you and Reginhard. God bless you.
Ich möchte ein paar Sachen kaufen....und vielleicht auch welche verkaufen.
Sicher, Sicher....Hier, werft einen Blick auf meinen Bestand...
Irgendetwas anderes?
Welche Waren sollte ich hier einkaufen um mit anderen Dörfern damit handeln zu können?
Nichts. Danke.

That information can be best obtained from caravan masters and travelling merchants. If you want, I can send you to the district where foreign merchants stay at when they come to the town. If you spend some time there and listen to the talk, you can learn a lot about what to buy and where to sell it.
Then I'll go and spend some time with these merchants.
I have no time for this right now.
Good day, friend. If you've come to watch the tournaments, you've come in vain. There won't be a tournament here any time soon.
Tournaments? So they hold the tournaments here...

Yes. You should see this place during one of the tournament fights. Everyone from the town and nearby villages comes here. The crowd becomes mad with excitement. Anyway, as I said, there won't be an event here soon, so there isn't much to see. Except, there is an official duel every now and then, and of course we have melee fights almost every day.
Tell me about the melee fights.

The fighters and knights get bored waiting for the next tournament, so they have invented the training melee. It is a simple idea really. Fighters jump into the arena with a weapon. There are no rules, no teams. Everyone beats at each other until there is only one fighter left standing. Sounds like fun, eh?
Gibt es eine Belohnung?

There is, actually. Some of the wealthy townsmen offer prizes for those fighters who show great skill in the fights. If you can beat {reg1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {reg11} peningas. You'll get {reg12} peningas for striking down at least {reg2} opponents, {reg13} peningas if you can defeat {reg3} opponents, and {reg14} peningas if you can survive long enough to beat {reg4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last {reg59?fighter:man} standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {reg15} peningas. Sounds good, eh?

Some of the wealthy townsmen offer prizes for those fighters who show great skill in the fights. If you can beat {reg1} opponents before going down, you'll earn {reg11} peningas. You'll get {reg12} peningas for striking down at least {reg2} opponents, {reg13} peningas if you can defeat {reg3} opponents, and {reg14} peningas if you can survive long enough to beat {reg4} opponents. If you can manage to be the last {reg59?fighter:man} standing, you'll earn the great prize of the fights, {reg15} peningas. Sounds good, eh?
Can I join too?
Ha ha. You would have to be out of your mind not to. Of course. The melee fights are open to all. Actually, there is going to be a fight soon. You can go and hop in if you want to.
Hello. You seem to be new here. Care to share your name?
Ich bin {playername}.
Well met, {playername}. I am the master of the tournaments here at {s1}. Talk to me if you want to join the fights.

Ha-ha, that's quite the bruise you're sporting, but don't worry. Everybody gets trounced once in awhile. The important thing is to pick yourself up, dust yourself off and keep fighting. That's what champions do.
Hey, you managed to take down {reg8} opponents. Not bad, but that won't bring you any prize money. Now, if I were you, I would go back there and show everyone what I can do...
You put up quite a good fight there. Good moves. You definitely show promise. And you earned a prize of {reg10} peningas for knocking down {reg8} opponents.
That was a good fight you put up there. You managed to take down no less than {reg8} opponents. And of course, you earned a prize money of {reg10} peningas.

Your performance was amazing! You are without doubt a very skilled fighter. Not everyone can knock down {reg8} people in the fights. Of course, you deserve a prize with that performance: {reg10} peningas. Nice, eh?
That was damned good fighting, {playername}. You have very good moves, excellent tactics. And you earned a prize of {reg10} peningas for knocking down {reg8} opponents.

Congratulations champion! Your fight there was something to remember! You managed to be the last fighter standing beating down everyone else. And of course, you won the grand prize of the fights: {reg10} peningas.
Hello, {playername}. Good to see you again.
What would you like to do?
About the melee fights...
Will there be a tournament in nearby towns soon?
I need to leave now. Farewell.
{reg2?There won't be any tournaments any time soon.:{reg1?Tournaments are:A tournament is} going to be held at {s15}.}
There will be a fight here soon. You can go and jump in if you like.
Good. That's what I am going to do.
Thanks, but I will give my bruises some time to heal.
Good {reg59?girl:man}. That's clever of you.
Actually, can you tell me about the rewards again?
Hello, {reg59?girl:boy}. If you have any prisoners, I will be happy to buy them from you.
Dann sollten Sie besser Ihren Geldbeutel bringen. Ich habe Gefangene zu verkaufen.
Not this time. Farewell.
Ich möchte sehen, was Sie haben...
When you take more prisoners, bring them to me. I pay well.
I'll give you nothing but cold steel, you scum!
There's no need to fight. I can pay for free passage.
Silver without blood, that's our favourite kind! Hmm, having a look at you, I reckon you could easily come up with {reg5} peningas. Pay it, and we'll let you be on your way.
Very well, take it.
I don't have that much money with me
That's too bad. I guess we'll just have to sell you into slavery. Take {reg59?her:him}, lads!
Hey, I've heard of you! You slaughter us freebooters like dogs, and now you expect us to let you go for a few stinking coins? Forget it. You gave us no quarter, and you'll get none from us.
Heh, that wasn't so hard, was it? All right, we'll let you go now. Be off.
Eh? What is it?
Time to hand over that big purse of yours, isn't it?
Your luck has run out, wretch. Prepare to die!
Why wouldn't you hand over yours, scum?
Do you know whom you are talking to? I will not kill you if you join me.
Ich schere mich recht wenig darüber wer Ihr seid. Es ist Zeit für Euch zu sterben.
Yes, I've heard of you. They say your men get the best loot. Forgive us, and we will be delighted to join such a fierce leader.
We would consider your offer if you added {reg0} peningas to it.
Peningas come to me more easily than quality fighters do. Welcome to my army.
Ich habe nicht genug Geld...
Jetzt weiß ich, warum man Sie einen Banditen nennt. Macht nichts.
And I for my part welcome such doughty men!
On second thought, I want fighters more loyal to me than the spoils. Never mind.
Huh. I've always fancied being called 'Killer.' Time to make me a new name.
Here's my second thought: eat my steel!
Never mind, I have no business with you.
Do you want us to follow you?
Yes. Let us ride together.
No. Not at this time.
Unfortunately, you do not have room in your party for us.
We are at your command.
You will not capture me again. Not this time.
You don't have a chance against me. Give up.
I will give up when you are dead!
I beg you! Please leave us alone.
Do you think you can run away from me? You will be my prisoner or die!
Very well, we'll leave you in peace this time. Do not oppose us again.
Haven't you got any mercy? Well, we will fight you to the last man!
Hmmm. Ten peningas for each looter makes {reg1} peningas for all {reg0} of them.
Let me see. You've brought {reg0} bandits, so 20 peningas for each comes up to {reg1} peningas.
Well, well, you've captured {reg0} brigands. Each one is worth 30 peningas, so I'll give you {reg1} for them in total.
I suppose that'll be all, then.
Yes, {reg59?Lady:Lord} {s1}?
{s1}, redeem yourself in the eyes of Odin, and rid yourself of that Christian weakling God!
{s1}, repent of your sins and accept the one true Lord, our saviour, Jesus Christ!
Wonderful news, you're free to go!
On the second thought, maybe you should stay my prisoner
Whatever suits you!
I will not forget this act of Honor!
You will remain my prisoner until one of your relatives reimburses me for you.
Truly, this is beneath you.
I trust you will be as understanding when I hunt you down like the dog you are!
I will set you free if you allow me to court your {s11}, {s33}.
Ich glaube ich kann damit leben.
I think you are plain crazy to offer me something like that!
I see you have some fine armor and weapons in good condition...
Yes, and what is it to you?
Nothing, just admiring.
Perhaps, it's time to share it with someone needy.
Eh?
I'd like to try on your {s13}.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
I don't think you'll need your {s13} any time soon.
Nichts, nur ein Scherz.
Ja, richtig!
I am not joking, remove your {s13} and hand it over to me!
You are nothing but a common thief, {playername}. I will always remember this!
Hey, du!
I will set you and the rest of your lot free, if you attack my enemies.
Do not try running away or trying something stupid. I am watching you.
I can't stand the sight of you! Die!
It could be the mead talking, but today I really feel like setting you free.
Oh, thank you, your Highness.  God bless you!
I would like to offer you a place in my shield wall.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}. I swear on my mothers grave I will serve you, my {reg59?lady:lord}!
It would be best if your highness just let me go home, I'm not interested.
Ich sehe...
In my shield wall, we are all treated as equals.  I expect your obedience and also your trust.
I will obey your wishes, my {reg59?lady:lord}.  I swear!
Sorry, but I really don't have space for you at the moment.
Ausgezeichnete Nachrichten!
Nein, ich schwöre, ich werde nicht.
Sorry, but I am not your puppet!
It sounds intriguing. Which enemy do you have in mind?
Ich habe gerade meine Meinung geändert.
Very well, what do you want me to do?
I want you to attack {s34}.
I want you to attack {s35}.
Ich habe gerade meine Meinung geändert.
Very well, we will try to attack {s33}.
Very well, we will attack {s33}.
I will show you how to use your weapons properly, so next time you will not surrender, coward!
Please, {reg59?lady:sir}, don't kill me. There is no honor in killing someone who can't defend himself.
There may be no honor, but I will feel better after I separate your head from your shoulders!
You're right. I'd better use pumpkins for my practice.
(One swing of your weapon cuts off the prisoner's head, and it rolls across the floor.)
Es steht euch frei zu gehen.
Leb wohl.
Greetings, {reg59?my lady:your lordship}. How can I serve you today?
Good day. What can I do for you?
I want to buy a new weapon. Show me your wares.
I am looking for some equipment. Show me what you have.
I am thinking of buying a horse.
Ah, yes {reg59?madam:sir}. These arms are the best you'll find anywhere.
Of course, {reg59?madam:sir}. No better prices in all the land!
You have a fine eye for horses, {reg59?madam:sir}. You won't find better beasts than these anywhere else.
I want to refine one of my weapons.
Welcher?
Macht nichts.
Hmm, let me take a look... Your {s7} is {s8}. I think I will be able to make it {s9} for {reg1} peningas. {s10}
Hmm, let me take a look... There is nothing I can do for your {s7}. I can't refine it.
einverstanden!
Ich habe meine Meinung geändert.
Ich habe nicht genug Geld ...
Here you have your {s7} back. It's refined.
I want to refine one of my armor parts.
Welcher?
Macht nichts.
Irgendetwas anderes?
Tell me, what are people talking about these days?
I don't know anything that would be of interest to you.
Well, nothing new lately. Prices, weather, the war, the same old things.
Leb wohl.
Mein {reg59?lady:lord}?
Guten Tag, {reg59?madam:sir}.
I am looking for a man by the name of {s4}. I was told he may be hiding here.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. If he is hiding here, you will surely find him if you look around.
Have you seen any {s22}-playing guards around here?
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. Haven't heard or seen anyone like that, but if he is hiding here, you might be able to find him if you look around.
Strangers come and go to our village, {reg59?madam:sir}. Me and my friends were listening to the sounds of a {s22} the other day, but I don't recall that person. Perhaps he's left already?
I am looking for someone who may or may not be a ghost.
A ghost? Hah! Ghosts don't appear during the day! Try finding him at night!
A ghost? Ghosts don't appear on their own! You need to walk by him to wake him up.
Pardon me, but is that a {s5} you're wearing?
Eh? What kind of gibberish is that?
Macht nichts.
{s4} sent me to collect your reports. Do you have them with you?
I've been expecting you. Here they are, make sure they reach {s4} intact and without delay.
Leb wohl.
Was könnt ihr mir über dieses Dorf erzählen?
Was könnt ihr mir über diese Stadt erzählen?
Wo finde ich Adda?
She lives on the wharf, {reg59?madam:sir}, where she trades in goods brought by merchants. It is one of the tall houses there.
Wie ist das Leben hier?

Disaster has struck my family, {reg59?madam:sir}. We have no land of our own, and the others have no money to pay for our labor, or even to help us. My poor children lie at home hungry and sick. I don't know what we'll do.
My life is miserable, {reg59?madam:sir}. I haven't been able to find a job for months, and my poor children go to bed hungry each night. My neighbours are too poor themselves to help me.
Dann nehmt diese 300 Pfennige. Ich hoffe, sie werden euch und eurer Familie helfen.
Then clearly, you must travel somewhere else or learn another trade.
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}. I will do as you say.
{reg59?My good lady:My lord}, you are so good and generous. I will tell everyone how you helped us.
Thank you for your kindness, {reg59?madam:sir}. With your help, our lives will be better. I will pray for you every day.
Times are hard, {reg59?madam:sir}. We work hard all day, yet we go to sleep hungry most nights.
Times are hard, {reg59?madam:sir}, but we must count our blessings.
We are not doing too badly, {reg59?madam:sir}. We must count our blessings.
Was ist Euer Handel?
What is the latest rumor around here?
I don't know anything that would be of interest to you.
I haven't heard anything interesting lately.
[Verlassen]
Yes, {reg59?madam:sir}?
How goes the watch, soldier?
All is quiet, {reg59?madam:sir}. Nothing to report.
Good. Keep your eyes open.
Good day, {reg59?madame:sir}. Always an honor to have you here in {s10}.
Your orders, {reg59?my lady:my lord}?
We are not supposed to talk while on guard, {reg59?madam:sir}.
I just wanted to ask about your lord. Do you know where he is now?
I'll be on my way, then.
{s1}^^Now forgive me. I must get back to my duties.
We are not supposed to talk while on guard, {reg59?madam:sir}.
Stay on duty and let me know if anyone comes to see me.
Yes, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. As you wish.
I want you to arrest this man immediately!
Who do you want arrested {reg59?madam:sir}?
Ah, never mind my high spirits lads.
Forget it. I will find another way to deal with this.
Arggh! Ich hasse das.
Thank you for helping us against those bastards.
Ich werde aus deinem Schädel trinken!
Your orders, {reg59?madam:sir}?
Erzählen Sie mir über sich selbst.
Aye, {reg59?madam:sir}. Let me tell you all there is to know about me.
Irgendetwas anderes?
Bran, what is your story?
Bran, are you happy in my shield wall?

Not much to tell. I am the ninth child of Caliacas, the smallest. My father is more of an influential man than a rich one. He gave me two options: join you or enter the monastery. Honestly, I'd rather fight and have the opportunity to get rich than be locked up behind stone walls, so I did not think long! And here I am!
Nothing. Keep moving.
Ihr habt keine Chance gegen uns. Ergebt euch jetzt oder wir werden euch alle töten...
Wir werden euch bis zum bitteren Ende bekämpfen!
Nicht angreifen! Wir ergeben uns.
Was wollt Ihr?
Ergebt euch oder sterbt!
Nicht. Wir lassen euch in Frieden.
You should go ask at Doccinga. The village is quite near. You need to talk to Thonkrik.
The Heavens alone grant us victory.
I'm glad to see that you're alive, too.

Yes, yes... Now, a couple of my boys have the watch captain pinned down in a back room with a knife at his throat. I'll need to go drag him before {s5} and explain what this breach of the peace is all about. You don't need to be part of that, though. I'll tell you what -- if all goes well, I'll meet you in the mead hall again shortly and let you know how it all came out. If you don't see me in the mead hall but instead see my head on a spike over the city gate, I'll assume you know enough to stay out of town for a while and forget this whole episode ever happened. So -- hopefully we'll meet again!
Wer bist du? Wie komme ich hier her? Wo bin ich?
Mein Kopf schmerzt! Ich erinnere mich an nichts seit ich über Bord des Bootes ging.

You have been close to death, unconscious for two weeks. Doccinga fishermen found you near the coast, clinging to a plank. You were barely breathing, and your body was covered with wounds. They brought you here so that I would heal you.
Doccinga? Then I am in Friese! Are you the old sorcerer, the man who can cure all diseases?
Ich habe genug gehört. Ich werde nach Doccinga gehen und mich nach den anderen Passagieren erkundigen. Lebt wohl.

No. One man only could claim such fame. People from around the world came in search of cures at his door. They were so numerous that came up the trails to Doccinga! But that man died a year ago. I am Aebbe, his son, a simple healer.
Vor einem Jahr, sagst du? Verdammt, ich habe alles verloren! Diese Reise war völlig umsonst!
Ich habe genug gehört. Ich werde nach Doccinga gehen und mich nach den anderen Passagieren erkundigen. Lebt wohl.

Viele wie Ihr waren seit meines Vaters tot hier, sie verließen alles für das Versprechen einer Heilung, welche ich ihnen nicht geben konnte. Es tut mir leid, aber die Fähigkeiten meines Vaters starben mit ihm.
Wisst Ihr ob die Fischer noch andere gefunden haben? Vielleicht ist meine Mutter noch immer am Leben...
Ich muss mit den Fischern sprechen und sie über die anderen Passagiere der Woden Ric befragen. Auf Wiedershen.
Sie haben nur Sie hier her gebracht. Ich weiß von niemand anderen. Sie sollten wohl in Doccinga nachfragen. Das Dorf ist nicht weit. Sie sollten mit Thonkrik reden.
Nun, Sie sind ja ungeduldig! Sie sollten wohl in Doccinga nachfragen. Das Dorf ist nicht weit. Sie sollten mit Thonkrik reden.
Nun gut, Heiler. Ich werde mit Thonkrik von Doccinga reden. Auf Wiedersehen.
{s1} ist nahe. Viel Glück, Fremder. Thonkrik ist ein guter Mann. Er wird Ihnen helfen.
Gebt auf oder sterbt. Trefft eure Wahl.
Ich hab keine Angst vor Euch. Ich werde kämpfen.
Wisst Ihr mit wem Ihr hier redet? Ich werde euch nicht töten, wenn ihr mir beitretet.
Ich schere mich recht wenig darüber wer Ihr seid. Es ist Zeit für Euch zu sterben.
Ich schere mich recht wenig darüber wer Ihr seid. Es ist Zeit für Euch zu sterben.
Ja, ich habe von Euch gehört. Sie sagen, Eure Männer bekommen die meiste Beute. Vergebt uns, und wir wären erfreut einem so leidenschaftlichen Anführer zu folgen.
Wir würden solch ein Angebot in Betracht ziehen, wenn Ihr es noch mit {reg0} Pfennigen schmückt.
Was? Würde ich eine solche Kleinigkeit unser Freundschaft vergiften lassen? Willkommen in meiner Armee.
Ich habe nicht genug Geld...
Macht nichts. Ihr seid einfach nur verrückt.
Ihr Typen würdet meine Mannschaft nicht noch hässlicher machen. Willkommen!
Ach nichts. Ich habe einen Ruf zu wahren.
Warum würdet Ihr uns jetzt bitten Beleidigungen zu Verletzungen zu machen? Sie sind der, der verrückt ist.
It's your head that you should be considering. Not that it's very good at that. At 'em, boys!
Hallo. Was kann ich für Sie tun?
Erzählen Sie mir über sich selbst.
Nun gut, hören Sie...
Irgendetwas anderes?
[Fertig]
Lasst eure Waffen fallen und ergebt euch, wenn ihr leben wollt.
Wir werden zuerst gegen Euch kämpfen.
Yes, {reg59?my lady:my lord}. Which message do you wish to send to the vassals?
Ich wüsche eine neuen Feldzug zu starten. Lasst uns unsere Armee hier versammeln.
Ich wünsche den Feldzug zu beenden und alle sollen nach Hause zurückkehren.
Ich wüsche alle Fürsten des Reichs zu einem Fest in {s4} einzuladen.
Macht nichts
Möchtet Ihr die Fürsten des Reichs zu einem Fest einladen?
Ja. Es ist Zeit unseren Zusammenhalt zu stärken und dies bringt uns näher zusammen.
Nach ein wenig Überlegung, ist die Zeit hierfür vielleicht doch noch nicht gekommen.
All right, then I shall dispatch messengers informing the lords of the realm of your feast at {s4}.
Wünscht Ihr alle Fürsten für den neuen Feldzug zu versammeln?
Ja. Wir müssen all unsere Kräfte sammeln, befor wir gegen den Feind marschieren.
Nach weiterem Überlegen, wäre es nicht notwendig alle zu versammeln.
In Ordnung, dann werde ich Boten aussenden und jedem sagen, er soll hier erscheinen.
Wollt Ihr den laufenden Feldzug beenden und alle Vasallen von Ihrer Pflicht entbinden?
Ja. Wir benötigen unsere Streitkräfte hier nicht länger.
Nach weiterem Überlegen, wäre es vermutlich besser fürs Erste zusammenzubleiben.
Nun gut, ich werde alle wissen lassen, dass Sie von ihren Pflichten entbunden sind.
Overall, the wealthiest center in the Northlands is known to be {s4}. Here in {s5}, we are poorer than {reg4} centers, and richer than {reg5}.

In terms of local industry, the most productive center in the Northlands is known to be {s4}. Here in {s5}, we produce less than {reg4} centers and produce more than {reg5}. Production is of course affected by the supply of raw materials, as well as by the overall prosperity of the center.

In terms of the output of the surrounding villages, the center of {s4} is the richest in the Northlands. Here in {s5}, the villages produce less than the hinterland around {reg4} centers, and produce more than {reg5}. The wealth of a center's hinterland, of course, is heavily dependent on the tides of war. Looting and pillage, and shifts in territory, can make a major impact.

In terms of trade, the town of {s4} is believed to have received the most visits from caravans over the past few months. Here in {s5}, we are less visited than {reg4} towns, and more visited than {reg5}.
In terms of attacks on travellers, the town of {s4} is believed to be the most dangerous. Here in {s5}, we are less afflicted by bandits and raiders than {reg4} towns, and more afflicted than {reg5}.
Leb wohl.
[Verlassen]
